name: Fairy Touch
description:
Help the fairy fly through the forest! Watch out for the trees!

Art

  • coffepixel
  • Eder Muniz

Music

  • Fantasía de los Pinos by sawsquarenoise

Hi! I'm coffepixel, I'm learning to create games, this is my first official game. If you have any tips on how to improve I will be happy to hear them, if you downloaded to play, thank you very much!
